casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Consolidated Biscuit Company, Appellant, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio et al., Appellees.

[Cite as State ex rel. Consol. Biscuit Co. v. Indus. Comm., 117 Ohio St.3d 541, 2008-0hio-1738.]

(No. 2007-1027 Submitted March 25, 2008 Decided April 16, 2008.) Porter, Wright, Morris & Arthur, L.L.P., and Christopher C. Russell, for appellant. Marc Dann, Attorney General, and Sandra E. Pinkerton, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee Industrial Commission of Ohio. Fell & Marcus Co., L.P.A., and George N. Fell II, for appellee William D. McMonigal Jr.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, and Cupp, JJ., concur.
